items.sentence: Tom was still asleep when Mary left for work.
I can\'t tell if you\'re being honest or not.
The only book Tom has ever read is the Bible.
The police are supposed to serve and protect.
How long are you planning on being in Boston?
How long does it take to the station by taxi?
Tom and Mary said they didn\'t want to fight.
There are a lot of places to visit in Boston.
There are a lot of things I want to do today.
I don\'t want you getting hurt because of me.
You have to do it even if you don\'t want to.
Tom looked like he wasn\'t feeling very well.
Tom knew Mary didn\'t really want to do that.
Tom doesn\'t find this as funny as Mary does.
It seems like your only choice is to do that.
I\'m waiting for Tom to get back from Boston.
Tom said he\'d call back as soon asÂ he could.
Tom says he\'s too tired to do any more work.
Tom couldn\'t go to John and Mary\'s wedding.
There\'s only one thing we still need to buy.
